description: A deployment of code, application, infrastructure or service. For example, a Kubernetes deployment. An auto scaling group is also considered a deployment.

desiredSize.description: Desired size (i.e. number of instances) associated with this deployment.

currentSize.description: Current size (i.e. number of instances) active with this deployment.

maxSize.description: Maximum size (i.e. number of instances) limited by this deployment.
